page.title: 05Golf Professional
page.content: We interviewed a golf professional.His name is{Mark Rowe}.The professional looks after the ground .You have got to have a very good handicap to become a professional.The golf professional told us that he sells all sorts of equipment to do with golf in the shop.Sometimes he comes every Saturday and Sunday to arrange some serious {competitions}.They sometimes get bored with golf especially if you use the same club.They signed a contract at Ross with a friend.They work in the shop each day and give some{lessons. {Repairs}are done at the shop as well.Altogether he thought it was a good life.At Perranporth there are two golf professionals.Perranporth is a very popular golf course.There are competitions for all age groups or standards.
